c74object.name: fl.future~
c74object.digest: Schedules frames in the future at a specified time.
c74object.description: The output is an empty frame.

entry.name: 0. /time [double]
entry.description: Sets the time of the next frame.

entry.name: 1. /units [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the time units used to set the interval between frames.
[0] - samples [1] - ms [2] - seconds

entry.name: 2. /mode [enum]
entry.description:
No parameter info available
[0] - absolute [1] - relative
